name: EasePath Auto-Applier
description: AI-powered job application autofiller for EasePath.

content_scripts._comment: Scripts must load in this order due to dependencies: utils.js provides base functions used by all other scripts; dom-analyzer.js and ui.js provide DOM manipulation and UI functions; form-filler.js and ats-adapters.js use utils and DOM functions; content.js orchestrates everything and depends on all other scripts.
